name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The president's approval rating has dropped to a new low. This is a newer low than the last new low. It is down to 33 percent today, which I think is lower than the "Emoji Movie." There's no light at the end of the tunnel.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Did you hear what Trump said about living in the White House? According to Golf magazine, of all places, the president told a group of members at his club in New Jersey the White House is a real dump. A White House spokesperson today denied the president said that, so it's true.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: To be fair, Donald Trump thinks any building that doesn't have his name on it is a dump.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The president is in an absolute tailspin. His approval rating is in the basement. And, he's living in a dump.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Tomorrow the president is leaving for a two-week vacation to his beloved Bedminster golf club in New Jersey. Finally, he'll get time to play some golf.
